title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 7, pt. 766 - Licensed Home Care Services Agencies-minimum Standards
content:

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 10, ch. V, subch. C, art. 7, pt. 766

Statutory authority: Public Health Law, §§ 201, 225, 576, 2164, 2500-a, 2522 [6], 2528, 2800, 2803, 2904, 2904-b, 3600, 3612, 3613[9], 4010, 4175; Social Services Law, §§ 363-a, 364[2], 365-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
